text:
Zenefits | San Francisco, CA | Software Engineer | Full Time, Onsite | https://secure.zenefits.com/jobs/57437?gh_jid=57437&gh_src=b...

Zenefits is a disruptive, well-funded startup that provides an all-in-one HR solution for small businesses. It's also one of the fastest growing SAAS businesses in history! Companies who join Zenefits are able to consolidate their many HR systems into one easy-to-use place, the Zenefits dashboard, where they can also secure and manage benefits for their employees. Zenefits the product is fast moving, and the engineering team is growing fast! There's still a lot of work to be done, and the projects we work on are high-impact projects with a tangible effect on the business. I haven't been here long, but so far it's clear that the perks are great, the people are of the highest quality, and there's a great culture of transparency and shared ownership. Experience with Python/Django and Ember.js are by no means necessary, but certainly won't hurt.

https://secure.zenefits.com/jobs/57437?gh_jid=57437&gh_src=b...
